title: CS Practical Competency Enhancement: Teaching Presence for Collaborative Constructivism in Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners identify instructors' social, cognitive, and teaching presence in online discussion forums at over 80% accuracy

Learners incorporate peer feedback and instructor-customized guidance into project-based assessments at over 70% implementation rates
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
